text: Sérgio Duarte Mamberti (22 April 1939 – 3 September 2021) was a Brazilian actor, director, producer, writer, playwright, and politician. He was born in Santos, São Paulo. An actor, he was known for his roles in O Baiano Fantasma, The Lady from the Shanghai Cinema and in Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum. Mamberti was a member of the Workers' Party. He worked during the governments of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva and Dilma Rousseff.
